definition: important matter that must be kept secret (idiom); don't breathe a word of it to anyone!
to avoid mentioning/taboo word/name of deceased emperor or superior
do not/there is none who
surname Mo
as/as if/such as
deep/depth/deeply/(of a color) dark/deep/rich
old variant of 深[shen1]

sentences.english: Our ancestor's secrets remain safe - at least for now.
sentences.chinese: 至少目前为止，这些人类祖先的秘密仍然讳莫如深。

sentences.english: China manages its reserves with considerable secrecy.
sentences.chinese: 中国于外汇储备经营之道一向讳莫如深。

sentences.english: The lack of transparency from Apple creates a perfect storm for short-term traders.
sentences.chinese: 苹果的讳莫如深为短线交易者带来了一场完美风暴。

sentences.english: Wong Kwong Yu about how to start their own has been a closely-guarded secret.
sentences.chinese: 黄光裕对于自己如何起家，一直讳莫如深。

sentences.english: Details of his health have been kept secret by the Cuban government.
sentences.chinese: 古巴政府对他的健康详情讳莫如深。

sentences.english: It has reason to be diffident.
Despite such overdrafts word about it, but it is in reality.
sentences.chinese: 尽管人们对这类透支讳莫如深，但它却是现实存在。

definition: (idiom) reluctant to speak about it/tight-lipped
to refuse to say anything about (idiom)/to remain tight-lipped/to avoid mentioning
lips sealed and not saying anything (idiom); fig. to omit mention (of a non-person or embarrassing topic)/to censor
not to mention (idiom); to say not one word/fig. to omit mention (of a non-person or embarrassing topic)/to censor
to withhold information/to keep sth secret
lips sealed and not saying anything (idiom); fig. to omit mention (of a non-person or embarrassing topic)/to censor
to mention sth without elaborating (idiom); not giving details
lit. to guard one's mouth like a closed bottle (idiom); tight-lipped/reticent/not breathing a word
to be too shy to speak one's mind (idiom)
not knowing anything at all (idiom); completely ignorant/without an inkling
to not mention a single word (about sth) (idiom)
to speak evasively (idiom); beating about the bush
to avoid a taboo word or topic
to avoid a taboo word or topic/to refrain from/to avoid
to be well aware
to be secretive; to try to cover up (idiom)
to hold back from saying precisely what is on one's mind
